Plot: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.
Title: Frequency
Actors: Dennis Quaid, Jim Caviezel, Shawn Doyle, Elizabeth Mitchell
tomatoConsensus: A tight blend of surprises and suspense keeps audiences spellbound.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 7 nominations.
